fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may Rage and choose to rampage a Player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only Rage and Rampage twice.
- When Raging, you will have Powerful Defence and will attack anybody who visits you.
- If you rampage another Adventurer's house, you will not attack them.
- If another Adventurer visits you while Raging, you will not attack them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Adventurers.
